summary:
Animation is a way to make movies by bringing still pictures to life. Traditional animation uses hand-drawn images on clear sheets, while modern animation often uses computers to create images (CGI). There are also types like stop-motion and claymation.

Animation is different from live-action movies, but they often mix these styles. With advanced CGI, filmmakers can now add 3D animations to live-action movies, making exciting visual effects.
title: Animation
